text: yud'dham ceyyan ninnalkkita nirbandha kalpana nalkappettirikkunnu. atakatte ninnalkk anistakaramakunnu. ennal oru karyam ninnal verukkukayum (yathart'thattil) at ninnalkk gunakaramayirikkukayum ceyyam. ninnalearu karyam istappetukayum (yathart'thattil) ninnalkkat deasakaramayirikkukayum ceytennum varam. allahu ariyunnu. ninnal ariyunnilla
